Generation VII.Sun: This Oricorio has sipped purple nectar. Its elegant, attractive dance will send the minds and hearts of its enemies to another world.
Generation VII.Moon: It summons the dead with its dreamy dancing. From their malice, it draws power with which to curse its enemies.
Generation VII.Ultra Sun: It charms its opponents with its refined dancing. When they let their guard down, it places a curse on them that will bring on their demise.
Generation VII.Ultra Moon: This Oricorio has sipped purple nectar. Some dancers use its graceful, elegant dancing as inspiration.

Generation IX.Scarlet: This form of Oricorio has sipped purple nectar. It uses ethereal dance steps to call forth the spirits of the dead.
Generation IX.Violet: The elegant, attractive dance of these Oricorio is popular with adults, but the Oricorio themselves are hard to find in Paldea.
